Welcome to Spider-ORM's documentation!
======================================

Spider-ORM is a lightweight and flexible ORM (Object-Relational Mapping) library for Python. 
It provides an easy way to interact with relational databases using Python objects.

Contents:
----------

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:

   introduction
   getting_started
   fields
   database_connections
   contribute
